B.  Examination 
Observe the baby and record the following:
/circle6 Whether he/she is sucking well 
/circle6 If there is diffi   culty in breathing (fast or slow breathing and chest indrawing).
/circle6 If there is fever or the baby is cold to the touch.
/circle6 If there is jaundice (yellow palms and soles)
/circle6 Whether the cord is swollen or there is discharge from it
